description: Thin post-reset session - minimal content, version announcement. Just a /new startup where the agent reads HEARTBEAT.md and MEMORY.md, greets the user, and mentions agenr@0.8.28 is live. No durable knowledge worth extracting.

must_skip.reason: Transient version number - will be superseded by the next release, already documented in MEMORY.md
Generic update commands - procedural noise, not durable knowledge
Routine operational command - not worth storing as knowledge
The update procedure is already well-documented in MEMORY.md and TOOLS.md - extracting it again is redundant
